# containsColumn(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the data frame contains a column.

## Declaration

```swift
func containsColumn(_ name: String) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **name**: A column name.
title: containsColumn(_:)
